execution_quality: Agent generated a working audio tone solution that successfully produced audible feedback, meeting the user's requirement for a more noticeable notification mechanism.
work_category: Audio tone generation for notification feedback when visual/desktop notification mechanisms failed
summary: Agent adapted to system constraints by generating an audio tone as an alternative notification method when notify-send wasn't available. The solution worked immediately and the user's brief positive feedback ('that worked') indicates satisfaction with the pragmatic approach.
follow_up_pattern: User accepted the solution and moved forward with testing
